title: Australia v England: Ashes first Test, day two – live
summary: The tourists have established a 40-run lead as they head into the second innings of the series opener in Perth. Live updates will be provided by our writers. Stay tuned for more developments.

title: Trump calls Marjorie Taylor Greene resignation ‘great news for the country’
summary: The President expressed support for a colleague, stating, "I think she should be happy," in response to her stance on the Epstein files. The Democratic leader commended her commitment and approach to handling the sensitive issue. The comments highlight the ongoing discussions surrounding Epstein-related documents and accountability.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene announces resignation; Trump and Mamdani have cordial White House meeting – as it happened
summary: The live blog has officially ended, marking the conclusion of updates and coverage. Readers will no longer receive live information or new posts. Thank you for following along.

title: From staunch Trump ally to ‘traitor’: key takeaways of Marjorie Taylor Greene’s career
summary: A Georgia representative announced on Friday that she will resign from her position, with her departure effective in January 2026. The resignation marks a significant change in her political career. Further details about her reasons for leaving have not been disclosed.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene to resign from Congress in January
summary: A prominent Georgia Republican and key figure in the MAGA movement has decided to resign from his House seat. This move follows a significant split from former President Trump. The decision has raised questions about the GOP's factional dynamics moving forward.
